summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of CONTE AGUERO. These operations also involve requests for U.S. support and a proposal to establish a government on Cuban soil. The documents consistently detail Cardona's plans and requests, but CONTE AGUERO is not mentioned in any of the summaries.
